snippet: Hillel Oscar, 55, an umpire and the former captain of Israel’s national cricket team died after being hit in the jaw by a ball, the country’s cricket association said.
lead_paragraph: Hillel Oscar, 55, an umpire and the former captain of Israel’s national cricket team died after being hit in the jaw by a ball, the country’s cricket association said.

headline.main: Cricket Umpire Hit by Ball Dies
headline.print_headline: Cricket: Israeli umpire dies after being struck by ball
